Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class GameOverController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.GameOverController
public class GameOverController
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the interaction between client and server during the ending phase of the Game.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(GUIManager manager)
      Parameters:
      manager - the GUIManager to set the GameLobbyController manager attribute to

    • confirmPressed

      public void confirmPressed()
      Handles the pressing of the Confirm button.

    • confirmReleased

      public void confirmReleased()
      Handles the releasing of the Confirm button. Notifies the GUIManager that the Confirm button was clicked, putting this input on the messageQueue.

    • notifyGameError

      public void notifyGameError​(java.lang.String message)
      Allows notifying the user that there was an error while trying to join a Game.
      Parameters:
      message - the reason why the user couldn't join the Game

    • notifyDisconnection

      public void notifyDisconnection​(PlayerView player)
      Allows notifying the user that a Player has disconnected from the current Game.
      Parameters:
      player - the PlayerView representing the Player who disconnected

    • notifyGameOver

      public void notifyGameOver()
      Allows notifying the user that the current Game is over.

    • serverClosed

      public void serverClosed()
      Allows notifying the user that the server is down and makes him quit the game.
